comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: What we have here is the Newtown Court House, Australia Street, Newtown, New South Wales. Here it is on Google Street View: maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&... Some additional historical information: - Architect was James Barnet - Builder was A.H. Scouller - Construction years were 1883 - 1885. Therefore, this photograph was taken between 1883 and 1885. [ ref. NSW Heritage database: www.heritage.nsw.gov.au/07_subnav_01_2.cfm?itemid=2030084 ]
